title: So i just recieved an e-mail about a survey from Riot games.

embed.description: The easy way to save screenshots, GIFs, and websites. Make everyone happy by sharing smarter, faster, and with your point crystal clear.

body:
What prompted this?

Also, once i entered the survey, it asked me in what country i reside. I responded "Other" (as it only displayed major countries such as the states, china, great britain and similar) and that was it. Survey over. You are not eligible. 

What was this, exactly? And why am i ineligible just because i do not live in one of seven countries?

replies.body: It may be due to the Region you're located in is a private Server that gathers it's own information! We do have a few of those :) Such as Japan, Garena, and a couple others as well!
